name: GOD EATER BURST DRAMA AND ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK
summary:
Track 01 Over the clouds -Burst mix-
Lyric : Narumi Yamamoto
Compose : Kazuhito Kikuchi
Remix : Akitaka Tohyama

Track 10 my life -farewell arrange-
Lyric : Tohko Furuuchi
Compose : Kazuhito Kikuchi
Arrange : Go Shiina

Contains 5 tracks newly composed for God Eater Burst as well as "my life -farewell arrange" exclusively written for this release. The first printing features commentaries from voice actors.
